live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Work to restore services in the area continues. Estimated time of resolution is currently 11:00pm MT.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
34672.summary: Some customers in Parkland Village and the Brookwood area of Spruce Grove are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34672.title: Mar 7 - Parkland Village & Spruce Grove (Brookwood) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
